# Changelog

## **0.0.5** - *2020-04-05*
* performance improved;

## **0.0.4** - *2020-04-05*
* fixed bug "invalid regular expression flag s" in Firefox;

## **0.0.3** - *2020-03-07*
* accept `Buffer` and `Uint8Array` as a source;
* readme fixed;

## **0.0.2** - *2020-03-07*
* parse `subject` (keywords);
* Node.js usage example added;

## **0.0.1** - *2019-11-28*
* initial release
